name: Sheldon Swanepoel

experience.title: Managing Director
experience.description: Mavie Next is a corporate startup of UNIQA Insurance Group, where we build, buy, and integrate healthcare solutions to create a comprehensive healthcare journey. MavieMe is the 'health from home' unit of Mavie. We do home tests for blood and gut microbiome, with many more to come.

experience.title: Freelance Accountant
experience.description: ‚Ä¢	Activities range from full financial and management accounting service (excluding tax assessment), to subcontracted accounting tasks such as recons and reports of VAT, Payroll, Expenditure etc. ‚Ä¢	Since taking over the accounting for two companies, I have migrated their accounts to a more suitable Accounting Software; significantly cut reporting time; formalized accounting policies; and created complex Excel sheets for real-time portfolio analysis and tax planning. I also have limited input in investment decisions.‚Ä¢	For one client, had to reconstruct full accounts for 2010 ‚Äì 2014 for a now inactive company, for Tax Assessment. I had to work with incomplete records, and use my problem-solving skills to make do with a patchwork of various incomplete sources of information, and ensure balancing with the few VAT returns that were submitted.
experience.description_html: ‚Ä¢ Activities range from full financial and management accounting service (excluding tax assessment), to subcontracted accounting tasks such as recons and reports of VAT, Payroll, Expenditure etc. ‚Ä¢ Since taking over the accounting for two companies, I have migrated their accounts to a more suitable Accounting Software; significantly cut reporting time; formalized accounting policies; and created complex Excel sheets for real-time portfolio analysis and tax planning. I also have limited input in investment decisions.‚Ä¢ For one client, had to reconstruct full accounts for 2010 ‚Äì 2014 for a now inactive company, for Tax Assessment. I had to work with incomplete records, and use my problem-solving skills to make do with a patchwork of various incomplete sources of information, and ensure balancing with the few VAT returns that were submitted.

positions.subtitle: SanusX
positions.description: I'm part of a cohort of Entrepreneurs responsible for ideating and validating new propositions within the healthcare market. I am working on tackling burnout in the medical profession. Feel free to reach out to me if this could be of interest to you or your practice!

experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: Co-founder and commercial lead for Watter, where we have developed a completely turbine-free micro hydropower generator, designed for slow moving waters in flat areas. Our generator requires only 0.7mph to operate at full capacity, compared to 4mph for best existing device - that's only 17.5%!

recommendations: Madeleine Choo ‚ÄúI've worked with Sheldon in the same Syndicate groups, where we worked on a variety of modules from Financial Management to Innovation & Technology. Sheldon has always been committed to our projects and ensures our reports/presentations are delivered to the highest quality. Alongside this, his excel knowledge and skills are excellent. Sheldon is always willing to help and explain, whether it be about Excel or Financial Management, he is always willing to take the time to explain and clarify anything that I did not understand, allowing me to learn and improve. Sheldon is a valuable team player and is a fantastic person to work with. ‚Äù
